content.raw: I think the valgrind complaint is fixed by pull request #571, but there is still some unusual behavior in setting the joint axes for the some of the universal joints in the firehose. Some of the joint axes are set to parallel or nearly parallel, which caused ODE complaints at [rotation.cpp:113](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/eacff658f3ec5e89577ad00a10dfc03b75b2f87b/deps/opende/src/rotation.cpp#cl-113), called by [universal.cpp:391](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/eacff658f3ec5e89577ad00a10dfc03b75b2f87b/deps/opende/src/joints/universal.cpp#cl-391).
content.html: I think the valgrind complaint is fixed by pull request #571, but there is still some unusual behavior in setting the joint axes for the some of the universal joints in the firehose. Some of the joint axes are set to parallel or nearly parallel, which caused ODE complaints at rotation.cpp:113, called by universal.cpp:391.
